New Records: Wales secured a 4-1 victory, their highest score in a Euro 2024 play-off semi-final
Key Match Events: Wales scored four goals in the match
The match was played at Cardiff City Stadium
The match was broadcast live on S4C and BBC Radio 5 live
Pre-Game Insights: Rob Page emphasized the need for Wales to perform at their best
Markku Kanerva highlighted Wales' strengths and Finland's challenges
Post-Match Reflections: Wales qualified for the Euro 2024 play-off final against Poland
The victory marked Wales' progress toward the European Championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales have a rich history of qualifying through play-offs
Finland's players included Teemu Pukki, Hradecky, Glen Kamara, and Marcus Forss
